征.definition: journey; trip; expedition; to go on long campaign; to attack

征人.definition: traveler (on a long journey); participant in an expedition; garrison soldier; new recruit

征伐.definition: to go on or send a punitive expedition

征勦.definition: to mount a punitive expedition against bandits

征塵.definition: the dust of a long journey

征夫.definition: traveler; soldier on expedition; soldier taking part in battle

征旆.definition: pennant used on expedition; war pennant

征服.definition: to conquer; to subdue; to vanquish

征討.definition: to go on a punitive expedition

征途.definition: long journey; trek; course of an expedition

征馬.definition: horse capable of long expedition; army horse

征駕.definition: horses and wagons for an expedition; vehicles and horses used in battle
